void ObjOaxConverterFrame::setAllCategories ( std::vector< wxString > *  ptrCat  ) 

Definition at line 168 of file ObjOaxConverterFrame.cpp.

00169 {
00170         // set standard category -> "Sonstiges"
00171         m_category = (wxT("Sonstiges"));
00172         
00173         // set standard category -> "Sonstiges"
00174         m_cbxCategory->SetValue(wxT("Sonstiges"));
00175         
00176         // create temporary iterator to extract all categories
00177         std::vector<wxString>::iterator it;
00178         
00179         // walk through all entrys and get category-name
00180         for (it = ptrCat->begin(); it != ptrCat->end(); it++)
00181         {
00182                 m_cbxCategory->AppendString(*it);
00183         }
00184         
00185         // append standard category, so it can be chosen again
00186         m_cbxCategory->AppendString(wxT("Sonstiges"));
00187         
00188         // we took ownership of ptrCat, so we need to delete it
00189         delete ptrCat;
00190 }

void ObjOaxConverterFrame::setData (  ) 

Definition at line 197 of file ObjOaxConverterFrame.cpp.

00198 {
00199         // set data
00200         m_width    = m_assemblyData->m_width;
00201         m_depth    = m_assemblyData->m_depth;
00202         m_height   = m_assemblyData->m_height;
00203         m_name     = m_assemblyData->m_name;
00204         m_category = m_assemblyData->m_category;
00205         
00206         // if a dimension is greater than SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE, rescale
00207         if (m_width > SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE || m_depth > SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE || m_height > SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE)
00208         {
00209                 // return max of dimenstions and get scale
00210                 double scale = (max(m_width, m_depth, m_height)) / SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE;
00211                 
00212                 // divide by scale
00213                 m_width = (int)(m_width / scale);
00214                 m_depth = (int)(m_depth / scale);
00215                 m_height = (int)(m_height / scale);
00216         }
00217         
00218         // update frame
00219         updateFrame();
00220 }

void ObjOaxConverterFrame::OnSpcWidthChanged ( wxSpinEvent &  event  )  [private]

Definition at line 301 of file ObjOaxConverterFrame.cpp.

00302 {
00303         // check if aspect ratio is enabled
00304         if (m_ckbProportion->GetValue())
00305         {
00306                 // get scale, calc actual value divide by m_assemblyData-value
00307                 m_scaleWidth = (double)event.GetInt() / m_assemblyData->m_width;
00308                 
00309                 // set new m_width
00310                 m_width = event.GetInt();
00311                 
00312                 // set new dimenstions with new scale
00313                 m_depth = (m_scaleWidth * m_assemblyData->m_depth);
00314                 m_height = (m_scaleWidth * m_assemblyData->m_height);
00315                 
00316                 // update frame
00317                 updateFrame();
00318         }
00319         else
00320         {
00321                 // set new value
00322                 m_width = event.GetInt();
00323                 
00324                 // update frame
00325                 updateFrame();
00326         }
00327 }
